security.allowFraming.title: Allow Site to be Framed
security.allowFraming.description:
Set who can frame your site.
DISALLOW FRAMING: Site is only allowed to be framed by itself
ALLOW FRAMING: Site is allowed to be framed by anyone
ALLOW FRAMING CUSTOM: Site is allowed to be framed by "Allow Site to be Framed By" list

security.allowFramingBy.title: Allow Site to be Framed By
security.allowFramingBy.description:
Set the list of origins that can frame your site when using "ALLOW FRAMING CUSTOM"
If scheme is not provided, https is assumed for X-Frame-Options header
